parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command
</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.56
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Menu
</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets item on given path to be checked or not. By default menu strip entries are not checkable. Once this command was executed, an entry can be become checked and unchecked. If an entry is checked is indicated by a tick to the left of the entry's text. Setting an entry to be checkable will overwrite set picture with [[menuSetPicture]].
</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[menuSetCheck]] [idc, path, checked]
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> path: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> checked: [[Boolean]]
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control [[menuSetCheck]] [path, checked]
</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]
</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> path: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> checked: [[Boolean]]
</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value>  [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value>  <Code>[[findDisplay]] 313 [[displayCtrl]] 120 [[menuSetCheck]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[0,1], [[true]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[‎menuChecked]]
</value></part></template>
